trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Everyone is so...carefree.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Unafraid and unconcerned in spite of their weakness, and how easily their lives could be torn apart in an instant...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such luxuries are lost to us. We have no hopes or dreams─not even the release of death. Only hunger.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Others are a means to an end. At times a literal one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We forge covenants with men, and come here to feed. Or to die.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I thought it would be no different when I was summoned by Zenos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Lives were tools to him, to be used and discarded at whim. In that respect, he was a voidsent at heart.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But towards you and you alone, he behaved...differently. And I cannot fathom why.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What was it that drove him? What made him choose such an end?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But enough about that man. He is dead, and we are all better for it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why are you here? Was there something you needed?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So you're heading back now. Then as per our bargain, I will go as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000130_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Everyone is here? Good. Let us set forth for the void once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>What is it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>He's...calling.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000160_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What is the meaning of this...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless I'm mistaken, that was intended for one of your kin. Who?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000180_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>It was for the briefest of moments, but...I felt her. Azdaja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000190_ESTINIEN<tab>I thought she was in the void.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000200_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As did I. Yet the presence was unmistakable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000210_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thus did I call out...only for it to fade and vanish.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps...she crossed over to the Source then immediately turned back?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I do not know...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000240_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Could she have found a way home...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>The how of it aside, if she was indeed in the Source, there may be clues where she came through that could lead us back to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>Where exactly was it that you felt her presence?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000270_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Far to the north. That was all I could discern.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000280_ESTINIEN<tab>The north, you say? Beyond the Bounty─Garlemald?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>As good a place to start as any.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>My apologies, Zero, but your return to the void will have to wait.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I told you before that I have no reason to go back there. Do as you will.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>...All right. I presume you wish to stay here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han until we return?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've kept me amply fed. I wouldn't be averse to helping you on your search.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>If Azdaja was indeed here, other voidsent may have made the journey as well...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, we would welcome your company.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000360_ESTINIEN<tab>If it's decided, then I'll contact our associates in Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000370_ESTINIEN<tab>...It's me. Still talking everyone's ears off, I trust?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000380_ESTINIEN<tab>Understood. We'll see you there.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000390_ESTINIEN<tab>We're to rendezvous at Tertium.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000400_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll need to teleport to make it there in time. Can you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. I know it well from my time as an avatar.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000420_ESTINIEN<tab>Then it seems we're all set.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is nothing else, let us see to our final preparations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>Any moment now...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>My friends, 'tis good to see you again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>And you. I was worried that the cold wouldn't agree with you, but you're both looking quite well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000470_ALISAIE<tab>You get used to it. It helps that there's no shortage of fuel and heaters like before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000480_YSHTOLA<tab>Glad to hear it. Have you been working in Garlemald all this time?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have. Though the worst is behind them, the people still have a long road ahead.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000500_ALPHINAUD<tab>They've taken steps towards forming an interim government, but it will be some time before any large-scale reconstruction effort can be carried out in earnest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>With the nation in ruins and the leadership void yet to be filled, there remains a lack of direction─a pervasive sense of aimlessness and worry.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000520_ALISAIE<tab>So we'll keep doing what we can until they can finally stand on their own.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Still, everyone wants to make things better, and we're here to help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000540_ALISAIE<tab>A lot of Garleans wanted nothing to do with us, but they're starting to come around. Slowly but surely.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing a fine job.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It sounds like quite the undertaking.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>You're too kind. But it's thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls that we've been able to make any progress.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, it has not been easy. But we've been able to make progress thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>The allied nations continue to send supplies which allow us to meet basic needs such as food and shelter.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Meanwhile, Jullus and a number of soldiers have begun a restoration initiative, with more and more volunteers joining by the day.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000590_ALISAIE<tab>Like Alphinaud said, they've got a long road ahead of them. But we'll get there together─one step at a time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you yourself helped them take one especially big step, didn't you? In vanquishing that blasphemy in the Tower of Babil.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. I can only hope that your deed will help the people to find peace and closure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000620_ALISAIE<tab>But enough about events here. What brings you to us? And with new company besides.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>This may take rather a long time to explain, but bear with me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000640_ALISAIE<tab>The Thirteenth!? After traveling to the edge of existence, I thought you'd keep your escapades closer to home for a while...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000650_ALISAIE<tab>But I suppose there's no stopping you. Not that I'm one to talk, of course...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000680_ALISAIE<tab>You could have at least invited me too! Surely there was room enough for me and G'raha in the undersea vault?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sorry...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were busy...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000690_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, it's fine. You can make it up to me on the next one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000700_ALISAIE<tab>I know, I know. I only meant to tease. Mostly...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>But on a more serious note... Are we sure it's wise to keep Zenos's former avatar around?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000720_ALISAIE<tab>I understand how you came to work together, but nevertheless...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're right to be cautious. I'm a voidsent after all. But do not conflate me with Zenos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To recall my time in his service─it...angers me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Is that so...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>I think we'll get along just fine, you and I.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000770_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Now that we are all caught up, to the matter at hand.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As we were about to resume our search in the void, I felt the presence of my sister Azdaja in the Source. Somewhere in the far north─perhaps even here in Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you have seen or heard anything out of the ordinary, I must know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>As a matter of fact, we may have.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>In recent days, we have had to contend with a surprising number of voidsent. And not the lesser kind that occasionally manifest, but ones possessed of considerable power.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>You think they might have been summoned? By whom?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're not sure. But as Jullus reminded us, practitioners of a certain traditional Garlean art rely upon voidsent servants.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>The very same I believe you have mastered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>While there are no known reapers left in Garlemald, we can't rule out the possibility that some are working in secret.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000860_ESTINIEN<tab>To summon not one, but several powerful voidsent, is no small feat. But if Azdaja was indeed called from the void...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Then it is likely the same party is responsible.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Alternatively, the aetheric confluence at the Tower of Babil may have triggered an expansion of natural fissures one could use to cross over, but I think that improbable if not impossible.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000890_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Then we must assume these events have indeed been orchestrated.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Well, summoned or no, we've been trying to track them to their origin. It's the mountains to the east, we think.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000910_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Can you guide us there?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would, but the terrain is too difficult to traverse on foot. Nor is flying an option due to the winds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Too much ground to cover in any case. Is there no way to narrow it down?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is one place we thought to look first: an isolated village rumored to have once been home to a reaper order.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>That would indeed make an excellent start. Though the question of how to get there remains.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus may be of assistance. Let us return to Camp Broken Glass and consult him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000970_ALISAIE<tab>What was it you wished to talk about?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why do you help these people?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What is it that you stand to gain?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001000_ALISAIE<tab>I'm sorry?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You don't act on behalf of a higher power, nor are you bound by a contract. In spite of this, you help them. Why?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001020_ALISAIE<tab>And there I thought it was something serious...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001030_ALISAIE<tab>I help them because I want to. Because it's the right thing to do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...But what do you stand to gain? You didn't answer the question.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001050_ALISAIE<tab>Didn't I? I followed my heart. What I got out of it came after.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001060_ALISAIE<tab>Was there anything else? If not, let's keep moving.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To act not out of obligation or in pursuit of gain. To simply...live. And they survive like this...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001090_ALISAIE<tab>All finished, are we? Good.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001100_ALISAIE<tab>The cold doesn't let up out here, does it...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001110_ALISAIE<tab>They've the means to keep everyone warm at Camp Broken Glass and Tertium. But the measures are still only temporary.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Subsisting on charity, dreading the day the sympathy of others is exhausted─it's no way to live. They need lasting safety and security.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001130_ALISAIE<tab>Though things will never be as they once were...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001140_ALISAIE<tab>If we can restore a modicum of normalcy to their lives, maybe that will be enough for them to move forward.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001150_ALISAIE<tab>If we're to achieve that, we have to work harder. I have to work harder.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing your best. Anyone can see that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just try not to overdo it, eh?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001160_ALISAIE<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001170_ALISAIE<tab>L-Lest you misunderstand, I wasn't fishing for a compliment... As I said, I'm doing this because I want to.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001180_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your support.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001190_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, come now, you think I don't know my own limits?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001200_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your concern.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001210_ALISAIE<tab>Well, our work here is done. We should be heading back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001220_ALISAIE<tab>I hope Alphinaud and Zero haven't gotten into any trouble.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001230_ALISAIE<tab>I cannot imagine how awful it must have been to serve as Zenos's avatar. To not only suffer him, but so much else...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001240_ALISAIE<tab>She's a fighter all right. Like you and me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001250_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at Tertium...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001260_HUNGARYGARLEAN10320<tab>Thank you, miss. Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This feels...strangely familiar...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001280_RESTLESSGARLEAN10320<tab>Excuse me, Alphinaud. My wife, she's come down with a high fever. Do you think you could take a look at her?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. Give me a moment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Zero, may I leave the rest here to you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Fine by me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001320_JULLUS<tab>Thank you again for your help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001330_JULLUS<tab>Er...Zero, was it? I take it you're one of Alphinaud's comrades?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Comrade...? We've entered into a cooperative pact, if that's what you mean.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001350_JULLUS<tab>Pact? No, no, nothing so formal. What I mean is, you must know each other well. Be on good terms, enjoy each other's company─that sort of thing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then no, he's not my comrade. I have none. Nor will I ever, I think.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001370_JULLUS<tab>Oh...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Did I say something odd?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001390_JULLUS<tab>No, not at all. On the contrary, it makes sense.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001400_JULLUS<tab>When Alphinaud and the contingent first arrived, we rejected them out of hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001410_JULLUS<tab>Whatever they may have claimed, they were the enemy. Savages with their savage ways. To accept their help was to admit defeat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001420_JULLUS<tab>But no matter how poorly we treated them, they didn't turn their backs on us. They stayed and listened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001430_JULLUS<tab>That's just the kind of people they are. Makes sense they'd get along with someone like you, who tries to push others away.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get along? I'm upholding my part of the bargain. There's nothing more to it than that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001450_JULLUS<tab>If you say so...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001460_JULLUS<tab>Ah, I'd nearly forgotten why I came. Are you hungry?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001470_JULLUS<tab>We all get rations, and considering the work you're doing, you're as good as one of us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I am running low on aether... Very well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001490_JULLUS<tab>Azim Steppe-style dumplings. Buuz, they call them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001500_JULLUS<tab>Never had a dumpling? It's like...a kind of bread stuffed with a filling─meat or vegetables usually─that you bake or steam.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001510_JULLUS<tab>We have our own recipes in Garlemald, too. My mother liked to make them. My brother and sister always fought over the jam-filled ones...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001520_JULLUS<tab>J-Just think of it as bread, all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001530_JULLUS<tab>I should warn you, though, they're spicy─helps them keep longer, I assume. Too much for the children to handle, though.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Interesting...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001550_JULLUS<tab>Interesting good or interesting...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't know much about taste. Not anymore. But I do feel a sensation in my mouth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001570_JULLUS<tab>Is that a bad thing?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not necessarily.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001590_JULLUS<tab>Heh, that's enough for me. I've heard it said that spices are more akin to fire than flavors. Perhaps that makes them easier to understand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Jullus. Getting acquainted with Zero, are we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001610_JULLUS<tab>Um...ah... I-I suppose I am...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001620_ALISAIE<tab>No harm in that. Acquaint away!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, everyone is here. Excellent. Thank you all for your hard work.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>I've just finished up myself. Shall we go and find Estinien?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001650_GARLEANSOLDIER10320<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001660_JULLUS<tab>Report!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001670_JULLUS<tab>Lost contact? When?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001680_JULLUS<tab>Voidsent─I'd bet my life on it. Understood. I'll investigate at once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001690_JULLUS<tab>A unit transporting supplies has gone silent en route to Broken Glass. I will go and search for it. Stay here and keep watch, but be ready to answer my call.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If it was voidsent, you'd be a fool to go alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They'll find you before you find your men. And then they'll devour you as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001730_JULLUS<tab>Perhaps you're right. Perhaps I don't stand a chance. But I can't just abandon them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can't repay you for the bread if you're dead. I'll go.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001750_JULLUS<tab>What!? No! I couldn't possibly ask you to do that!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm far better suited to dealing with voidsent. It makes sense.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Or do you mean to say you'd rather I stay here because you can't protect this place on your own?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001780_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001785_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001790_JULLUS<tab>Fine. Just...don't do anything stupid. Promise me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001800_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Grrr... Damn these demons!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Return to the camp. Now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001820_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Y-Yes, ma'am! Thank you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001830_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Kindred... Why do you interfere?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001840_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Ah, of course. You sold your soul to feed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001845_VOIDSENT10410<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I have taken bread. But my soul is forever mine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001870_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How big must the gate be for their like to come through...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001880_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is this it, then...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just like that time...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When Light still shone upon the world... When the Contramemoria still raged...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001910_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stand aside if you value your life.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001920_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>We're only after women and wine. Darkness can take the rest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001930_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're not taking another step towards that village.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001940_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stupid girl. You were warned.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001945_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001955_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001956_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>Gotcha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001957_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001958_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>And now we can get back to our business.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get up... Get up, damn you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Too weak. I need...help...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Someone...please...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The same mistakes, the same ends. Again and again. What should I...what could I have done?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Who?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You... What are you doing here...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002040_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola and Estinien had matters well in hand. So we went where we were needed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you stand?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're not finished yet, Zero. Let's fight together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We're a little late, but we've come to help you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...All right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will let it burn, this fire in my breast. Let it burn and rage and guide.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You did well to find me out here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have Jullus to thank for that. He was quite worried when he called.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>There would've been more casualties if not for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The people of Garlemald thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No, if it was not for you and the others, I...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Well, let's not fuss over details. We should return to Tertium─can you make it that far?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I think so.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002130_JULLUS<tab>Zero! Are you all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Well enough. No voidsent struck here, did they?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002150_JULLUS<tab>No, and there weren't any more casualties thanks to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What are you doing?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002180_JULLUS<tab>You'll have no debts to repay, if that's what you're worried about.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002190_JULLUS<tab>If anything, I owe you a week's worth of buuz.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002210_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Hah hah hah! All shall cower before the might of Archfiend Cagnazzo!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002220_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tell me one thing, Cagnazzo.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>A dragon of our world crossed over into yours long ago, but I have felt her presence here again. What is the meaning of this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002240_WATERMONOLITH<tab>I daresay what you felt...was this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002250_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>By the Sisters...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002260_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You... What have you done to Azdaja!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002270_WATERMONOLITH<tab>If you want answers, you'll have to get them from Lord Golbez.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002280_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Assuming you've the strength to face him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002290_WATERMONOLITH<tab>A pity I will not see the plan to fruition, but my part is done. And to fade with the thrill of battle in my heart makes it all the more worthwhile...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002300_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>No, wait! Where is she!? Where is my sister!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002310_WATERMONOLITH<tab>At long last, I go to join the great flow...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>By the gate's closing, there can be no doubt that he was the one who opened it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002330_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Oh, Azdaja... I prayed we might meet once more...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002340_ESTINIEN<tab>She is likely still in the void. Take heart─we will find her yet.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So, what now?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you discuss how to proceed with your search, I would excuse myself to look around. There may be salvage that we could use at the camp.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002370_ALISAIE<tab>In that case, I'll patrol the area for more voidsent.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, let us take a moment to consider our options.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Is Vrtra not back yet?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My apologies for the delay.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I am. As distressing as this turn of events was, the eye itself gives me cause to hope.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>While it is no longer possessed of Azdaja's will, it may yet lead us to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Were it not for your encouragement, I would never have dared to embark on my search, much less come this far.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002450_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will not lose faith. I will find my sister, wheresoever she may be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll return the eye to her together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>Though tainted, the eye has not fully succumbed to Darkness. Azdaja herself may have been able to resist its influence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Well, as much as we'd love to take part in your next foray, we can't abandon our efforts here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We'll need to keep a close watch in case the voidgate opens again as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though should it prove safe to do so, I have some ideas for how we might put this village to use.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>Do what you must. We will manage.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002520_YSHTOLA<tab>To free Azdaja, I expect we will have to deal with Golbez once and for all─after which you may undertake your work without worry.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>We look forward to the glad tidings.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002540_ALISAIE<tab>You'll take good care of everyone, won't you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? Why do you ask me this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Because comrades look out for one another, and I can't think of anyone more qualified to keep them safe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>True. I will do no less than I've promised.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>If our respective plans are settled, then let us head back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If everyone is ready, then let us depart for Alzadaal's Legacy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What was that!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>A deluge of aether. The mark of a terrible magick.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002620_ESTINIEN<tab>It wasn't far from here. Let's go!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002630_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Hey, you! Stop! If you're thinking of taking to sea─don't!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002640_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What has happened?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002650_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>We were out working our nets when a light suddenly shot up over Bhaflau Isle with a boom!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002660_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>A massive fiend then took to the skies.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002670_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Another blasphemy, we feared─but we didn't linger to find out.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Did you see where it was headed?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002690_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Can't say for sure, but it looked like it was northward bound.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002700_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I see... Our thanks for the warning, and do not let us keep you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Bhaflau Isle is connected to Alzadaal's Legacy. This cannot be a coincidence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002720_YSHTOLA<tab>In response to Cagnazzo's defeat, they have come for our gate...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002730_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So it seems. I would ascertain the situation at the vault, but the fiend must be dealt with ere people come to harm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002740_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I shall assume my dragon form and seek it out at once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>Wait.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>You heard the fisherman. A blasphemy, they called it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>If another flying creature were sighted now, others will assume the worst, and panic will spread. This is not the way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see to the fiend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can work together on this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>...You are right, Estinien.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will gather my soldiers and search the isle for casualties.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002800_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As you wish, the fiend is yours.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002810_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The fiend, I leave to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002820_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The hunt will go more swiftly with help. Zero, might I prevail upon you to accompany <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Very well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>Then Estinien and I will make for Alzadaal's Legacy and secure the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Stay on your guard. The enemy is clever and will have anticipated our response.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Be safe, my friends, and may the Sisters guide your steps.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Hello? Can you hear me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)We were too late. The vault has been destroyed, the alchemical furnace with it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)This was their true objective─to deny us entry into the void.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Cagnazzo and Azdaja's eye were a diversion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)A means to detain us in Garlemald while they went to work here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)To reduce the vault to rubble... That which you hunt is no ordinary foe. Have care.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002930_FIREMONOLITH<tab>(-???-)Such an exquisite sight... A canvas of vibrant colors. As was our world too, once...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>One of Golbez's champions, I presume.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you the one who destroyed the treasure vault?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002940_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I am. Rubicante, the archfiend of fire.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002950_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A monster in flesh, yet in spirit I remain a man. A prisoner of the past.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002960_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Such tears I wept when Darkness consumed the world. Until Lord Golbez came and spoke of salvation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002970_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Thus do I walk proudly at his side, to see his dream fulfilled.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002980_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Your heart is pure. For benevolent cause you seek the dragon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002990_FIREMONOLITH<tab>But I cannot allow you to have it─cannot allow you to interfere. If you would continue, then there is but one recourse.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003000_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I shall await you at the summit. Come, mortal! Come and weigh your righteousness against mine!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003010_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You stayed the course─as I knew you would. As too will I. Come!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It seems I was a step too slow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003030_FIREMONOLITH<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003040_FIREMONOLITH<tab>To defeat all of us archfiends... You are strong indeed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What is it that Golbez seeks?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why do you fight? What is it that you wish to save?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003050_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know my lord's true purpose?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003060_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. The knowledge will not change the outcome. Listen, then, and learn how all began...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003070_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know your enemy's heart?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003080_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. It bleeds more than you can ever understand, but I will speak, and you will listen, and learn how all began...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How long has it been since the world was undone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since Light and life gave way to Darkness and undeath. Since we were reduced to beasts befouled, squabbling over what scant aether remains...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you are different. You remember who you were, and the paradise for which you fought.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>That world will never be ours again. But we need not suffer in this purgatory of death and rebirth forever.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Join me, and together we shall seek the promised land!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003140_FIREMONOLITH<tab>There is no hope─no freedom from the wheel. You speak a fantasy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003150_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I speak truth. The Ascians' revelation. There are other worlds than this. Ours is but one of fourteen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003160_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>There is no greater proof than the whispers we hear─born of a neighboring reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003170_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A reality to which we may journey if we can but break down the barrier that divides us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003180_WATERMONOLITH<tab>You meant it, then? We will take this world as our own?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003190_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Gahahaha! Count me in!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003200_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>In return for your strength, I offer you opportunity to pursue your own ends in service to a greater cause...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003210_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A glorious kingdom of Light, wherein all may know death's sweet embrace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003220_FIREMONOLITH<tab>...And thus did we begin our great work.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You intend to forsake the Thirteenth and conquer the Source?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Just so. Our home is a lost cause, our only choice to begin anew.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>In this world, where we may reclaim our mortality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You served Golbez of your own volition...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003270_FIREMONOLITH<tab>As atonement for my failures. I tried to be a hero. Tried to stop the war...but I could not.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So in turn you wage another?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003290_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A means to a final end. The wheel of depravity must be broken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003300_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Even the most exalted succumb. We eat and eat and deepen the stain upon our souls, until only the hunger remains. Is this to be our fate for all eternity?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...I don't know. About this and a great many things.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003320_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But I do know that it's wrong to damn another to save yourself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not everything need be a trade. This I learned from the people of this world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Even without a contract, without any expectation of personal gain, they labor for one another.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I didn't understand it at first─and perhaps I still don't. But if I'm to achieve something, I'd rather do it their way. Else I am already a hunger-maddened beast.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003360_FIREMONOLITH<tab> Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003370_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Perhaps we have indeed surrendered to the hunger after a fashion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003380_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Make for our moon. There you will find both Lord Golbez and your dragon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why are you telling us this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you betraying Golbez?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003390_FIREMONOLITH<tab>To be so viciously slandered... Pride demands I prove my virtue at the last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003400_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Never. Our triumph is at hand, and the knowledge will avail you naught.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003410_FIREMONOLITH<tab>But to be so viciously slandered... Pride demands I prove my virtue at the last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003420_FIREMONOLITH<tab>And perhaps your own will resonate with his...and draw forth that singular jewel which abides deep within his heart.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003430_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A desire which lies beyond his quest to free us from our purgatory. A desire...all his own...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank goodness you're both all right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Unfortunately, we have nothing further to report apart from the loss of the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003460_YSHTOLA<tab>But tell us─how did you fare on the mountain?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>Golbez aspires to deliver voidsent unto the Source...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003480_YSHTOLA<tab>Where they may die and return to the Lifestream to be reborn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003490_ESTINIEN<tab>Far be it from me to deny them, but the cost to our people would be beyond unconscionable.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003500_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Voidsent themselves are inherently dangerous, never mind the chaos sure to follow should the barrier 'twixt our worlds be shattered. 'Twould be naught less than a calamity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can't let that happen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How can we prevent this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003510_YSHTOLA<tab>Certainly not. That said, our task has been rendered rather difficult.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003520_YSHTOLA<tab>The simplest way would, of course, be to strike at Golbez himself. That said, our task has been rendered rather difficult.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003530_VRITRA<tab>Indeed... Rubicante hath deprived us of a means to cross into the void.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>Cagnazzo's feint. That was doubtless what he meant when he said his part was done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003550_ESTINIEN<tab>Golbez sacrificed two archfiends just to stop us. He must need more time to break the barrier to our world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003560_VRITRA<tab>Then the days ahead will be critical. We must find a way back to the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>We could employ another Atomos, but that approach would only be viable if we found another planar fissure. An unlikely prospect.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>Better we explore other avenues.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>If you will excuse my absence, I shall return to Sharlayan to look for information.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003600_VRITRA<tab>By all means. Meanwhile, I shall seek the counsel of our alchemists.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>Time is of the essence, so─wish me luck.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>I'm no scholar. I'll find another way to keep myself busy here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Y'shtola alone will be more a match for those tomes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How about a little training to keep your lance arm honed?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003625_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>I don't doubt it. She's a veritable “Researcher of Light.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>Heh, rest assured I never shirk my training. I will be ready for whatever awaits.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003650_VRITRA<tab>Zero. May we call upon thee when next we venture unto the Thirteenth?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. And in case you're wondering, I won't ask for further payment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will go for myself. To try and understand why I spoke the words I said to Rubicante...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And the fire I felt within when you all came to my aid in Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>While our esteemed sorceress battles her tomes, let us see to our own affairs.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003700_VRITRA<tab>I will not fail you again, Sister...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Cagnazzo and Rubicante have joined with the great flow...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>In this world, 'tis the ravenous who are useful. And few were as ravenous as they.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003730_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You were fine pawns, my archfiends, and you have played your parts to perfection.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But with the goal in sight, I need no minions to do my bidding.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Hereon, I shall walk alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>At long, long last...the end draws nigh.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003770_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The end to life on that star. And the end to my suffering...
